name: Breaking News (Star Banner Games)
description:
Breaking News is a game about transmitting information.

Your goal is to bring a piece of information from its source to the Web, using a group of different people, who will spread it in their own ways. You need to make sure the information arrives accurately and objectively.

This Game was made for the Develop-To-Help game jam with the theme "Stronger Together". I only managed to make very few levels, but i will *try* to get a post-jam version out with some actual gameplay and more characters. we'll see about that. I will also upload a web-build when the jam is over.
